channel.title: Need serious help

item.title: Need serious help
item.dc:creator: @vithushan1000 vithushan1000
item.description:
@vithushan1000 wrote:

[quote=“ultimatepkvillage, post:1, topic:416712”][quote author=vithushan1000 link=topic=518607.msg3768932#msg3768932 date=1317505855]
help
i portfowared and my no-ip works i set my no-ip to my client i can login
but others cant login to it says error conncting to server for them help
[/quote]
you didn’t portfoward right, use the google stats checker! to see if its online or if you released the client its set to your ip which is 127.0.0.1 they need it set to your server ip if u want to make a deal read your pm[/quote]it says its online and i set it to my no ip not 127.0.0.1
